role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: autogen1
example.text: a fourth-quarter blow to earnings from the California earthquake

example.name: autogen2
example.text: yet another blow to a sport that its fans claim has been maligned unjustly for years
example.arg: to a sport that its fans claim has been maligned unjustly for years

example.name: autogen1
example.text: The U.S. , therefore , has a historic opportunity both to strike a blow for human rights in Somalia and to undo the superpower flip-flop of the late 1970s on the Horn of Africa .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: a settlement that will strike a blow for his client
